stork.net

Class BaseTCPInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.net.StorkInterface
      • stork.net.BaseTCPInterface

  • public class BaseTCPInterface
extends StorkInterface
    A base implementation of StorkInterface which is based on a TCP socket.

        Create a BaseTCPInterface for the given scheduler and URI.

        scheduler - the scheduler to provide an interface for.

      • port

        public abstract int port(URI uri)
        Determine the port from a URI without an explicit port number.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI to determine the port from.
        Returns:
        The port based on uri.

      • init

        protected abstract void init(io.netty.channel.ServerChannel channel)
        Initialize the ServerChannel created for this interface. This initialization method should attach handlers which eventually call #issueRequest(Ad) and attach callbacks to the request to write the response back to the requestor.
        Parameters:
        channel - the ServerChannel to initialize.
